title: Daniel Hudson Burnham
content: Let your watchword be order and your beacon beauty.

title: Lester Beall
content: The moment clients realize that revisions are not an all-you-can-eat buffet, suddenly they realize they are not hungry.

title: Felix Sockwell
content: Do what you love and tomorrow will pay the rent.

title: Samadara Ginige
content: A good design solves a problem. A bad design creates many.

title: Jay-Z
content: Be fluid. Treat each project differently. Be water, man. The best style is no style. Because styles can be figured out. And when you have no style they can’t figure you out.

title: Steve Jobs
content: When you’re a carpenter making a beautiful chest of drawers, you’re not going to use a piece of plywood on the back, even though it faces the wall and nobody will ever see it. You’ll know it’s there, so you’re going to use a beautiful piece of wood on the back. For you to sleep well at night, the aesthetic, the quality, has to be carried all the way through.

title: Erik Adigard
content: Design is in everything we make, but it’s also between those things. It’s a mix of craft, science, storytelling, propaganda, and philosophy.

title: Calvin & Hobbes
content:
Calvin: You can’t just turn on creativity like a faucet. You have to be in the right mood.

Hobbes: What mood is that?

Calvin: Last-minute panic.
